duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage small, minor and major capital projects from end to end.
Maintain visibility to the design process and assure adherence to all established key components and project deliverables.
Coordinate with the client as well as various other groups inside and outside of the organization.
Assist in development of pre-project approval documents.
Monitor design progress and deliverables are met in adherence to established project key components.
Receive design details from design team with full understanding of project deliverables.
Manage adherence to project scope and secure approvals for all changes in projects.
Manage and control project budget providing cost forecasts and cash flow projections.
Manage and maintain project milestone schedules with integrated detailed scheduling.
Provide construction management and plant startup assistance as needed to ensure successful project execution.
Evaluate, select and issue contracts for construction firms through bidding and prequalification vetting processes.
